group_1.textLeft: Hey, the piano still needs to be wiped down,@so hurry up.

group_1.textRight: Next up is organizing the sheet music,@so make it quick, okay?

group_1.narration: I mustn't cry.@If this is all I have to do, I'll be fine.
Being used like this is nothing compared to@the violence Asahi-chan is enduring or the@bullying Rabi-chan is facing.
I don't deserve to seek help from anyone, because I'm@the one responsible for breaking everyone's hearts...

group_1.textRight: Oh no, that was close! I almost forgot the sheet@music I need for practice at home!
You're lucky you noticed on the way to school.
Ah, the cleaning... It's still going on, huh?
Don't worry. We'll be leaving soon.
Sensei's a good person. I just want him to be a@little more gentle, y'know.

group_1.textCenter: (I know... They can't afford to worry about me...)
(If they worry about me, a Magical Girl, who knows@what could happen to them...)
(I don't expect them to act friendly just because@we're close... Everyone is protecting themselves...)
If I ask for help here, everyone else will suffer...

group_1.textRight: Huh, what are you mumbling about?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I was just trying to figure out how to be more@efficient! *Chuckle* â™ª

group_1.textRight: Don't laugh mockingly like that after taking@someone's life.
You understand what would happen if you ever@try telling Sensei, don't you?
You've heard that rumor circulating before, right?@About you and Sensei dating.
I wouldn't mind spreading it around again,@but this time with a bit more flair, you know?

group_1.textLeft: It's fine with me, I'm involved!@But please, don't drag Sensei into this!

group_1.textRight: I'm not serious.@I'm just saying, be careful.

group_1.textLeft: If it's something you don't feel comfortable talking@about, you don't have to tell me about it.
Just don't forget to ask someone for help if you@can't handle it on your own.
I'm part of the teaching staff.
If there's another teacher you'd like to talk to,@I'll let them know.
(I'm sorry, Sensei...@I can't consult with anyone...)

group_1.textRight: After she finishes cleaning, Kurusu will be on a@long-term assignment starting tomorrow.
I want the club to earn more recognition than@it did last year.
So I want you to win more than just the gold prize@in the solo performance competition this time.
Kurusu was chosen by Sensei for the Festival's@solo performance and lived up to expectations.
Don't disappoint me or you'll regret it.

group_1.narration: Singing, which used to bring me so much joy,@now feels like a curse...
Singing freely and comfortably, feeling my voice@melt into the air through my eardrums...@Those moments used to soothe me.
Now it feels as though a weight rests on my vocal cords,@hindering my ability to produce my voice properly...
